word:
1914 

     VISITED BY HER SON, JAMES EDSON, FOR SEVERAL WEEKS IN SPRING OF 1914.  JUNE 14, WROTE "THE VICTORIOUS LIFE"-- LAST WRITING BEFORE HER DEATH.  TM 516-520.  AUGUST 15, INTERVIEW WITH WCW REPORTED. MS. 12, 1914.  SEPTEMBER 8, INTERVIEW WITH DR. THOMASON REPORTED.  MS. 10, 1914.  DEC. 23, ONE OF HER COPYISTS WROTE TO W.C.W. ABOUT HIS MOTHER.  LS 436, 437.
